channel.title: Posts on Quantizr
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Quantizr

item.title: Dungeon Rooms Mod - Installation Guide
item.description: Dungeon Rooms Mod can be installed in the same way as other Forge mods, by dragging the mod jar into the mod folder. Read this tutorial if you don’t understand how to do this.

item.title: Secret Waypoints - Are they bannable?
item.description: Dungeon Rooms Mod’s Secret Waypoints follows the general interpretation of Hypixel’s rules, and is most likely not bannable, but as with all mods, it is use at your own risk. More details in full post.
